definition: (slang) to take on/to challenge/to go head to head/showdown/comparison

sentences.english: PK Electric Chain Hoists with perfect modern design are simple in structure.
sentences.chinese: PK型环链电动葫芦优化设计，结构精简。

sentences.english: PK was in accordence with open bicameral model.
You start referring to murderers as PKs .
He really did a great job in the finale, especially in the PK round.
sentences.chinese: 他决赛的表现真的很好，尤其是PK那一轮。
